description: Creates an HSM configuration that contains the information required by an Amazon Redshift cluster to store and use database encryption keys in a Hardware Security Module (HSM). After creating the HSM configuration, you can specify it as a parameter when creating a cluster. The cluster will then store its encryption keys in the HSM. In addition to creating an HSM configuration, you must also create an HSM client certificate. For more information, go to Hardware Security Modules in the Amazon Redshift Cluster Management Guide.

parameters.name: HsmConfigurationIdentifier
parameters.description: The identifier to be assigned to the new Amazon Redshift HSM configuration.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: A text description of the HSM configuration to be created.

parameters.name: HsmIpAddress
parameters.description: The IP address that the Amazon Redshift cluster must use to access the HSM.

parameters.name: HsmPartitionName
parameters.description: The name of the partition in the HSM where the Amazon Redshift clusters will store their database encryption keys.

parameters.name: HsmPartitionPassword
parameters.description: The password required to access the HSM partition.

parameters.name: HsmServerPublicCertificate
parameters.description: The HSMs public certificate file. When using Cloud HSM, the file name is server.pem.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: A list of tag instances. (dict) --- A tag consisting of a name/value pair for a resource. Key (string) --- The key, or name, for the resource tag. Value (string) --- The value for the resource tag.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The key, or name, for the resource tag.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The value for the resource tag.

nested_items.name: HsmConfiguration
nested_items.description: Returns information about an HSM configuration, which is an object that describes to Amazon Redshift clusters the information they require to connect to an HSM where they can store database encryption keys.

nested_items.name: HsmConfigurationIdentifier
nested_items.description: The name of the Amazon Redshift HSM configuration.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A text description of the HSM configuration.

nested_items.name: HsmIpAddress
nested_items.description: The IP address that the Amazon Redshift cluster must use to access the HSM.

nested_items.name: HsmPartitionName
nested_items.description: The name of the partition in the HSM where the Amazon Redshift clusters will store their database encryption keys.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: The list of tags for the HSM configuration.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key, or name, for the resource tag.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value for the resource tag.
